section.p: Smogmaw is a ramshackle town populated by a human stew of traders, thieves, adventurers, pirates, and fierce natives from upriver. All are drawn here by one common motive - greed. They hope that by trade or crime they will become rich at the expense of others.

if.if:
You can buy a shack here for 20 Shards. If you do,
cross off the money and put a tick in the box
next to the shack option.

choices.choice: Return to your shack {box} (if box ticked)
